button_browse_archive: Browse the Johannes Itten Linked Archive
explanation_facet_person_born_place: Filter by the birth place of a person
explanation_facet_person_died_place: Filter by the place of death of a person
explanation_facet_person_born_date: Filter by the birth date of a person
explanation_facet_person_died_date: Filter by the death date of a person
explanation_facet_person_has_gender: Filter by the gender of a person
explanation_facet_person_has_occupation: Filter by the occupation of a person
explanation_facet_person_role: Filter by the role a person appears as in the archive
explanation_facet_person_count: Filter by the number of persons the entity represents. This is relevant where an entity represents a group of persons
explanation_facet_person_digitised_objec: Filter by the availability of at least one digitised copy relevant for the person
explanation_facet_person_is_identified: Filter by whether or not a person has been identified.
explanation_facet_person_num_appearances: Filter by the number of appearances of a person in the archive
explanation_facet_person_relations_num_c: Filter by the number of collections a person is related to
explanation_facet_person_relations_num_p: Filter by the number of persons a person is related to
explanation_facet_person_has_relation_wi: Filter by the places a person is related to
explanation_facet_person_entry_heidelber: Filter by whether or not a person has an entry in the Werkverzeichnis
home_tagline: Discover the Itten archive through people and their networks
